table.name: ADSIMTemplateColumns
table.description: This table contains the details of the columns that are to be displayed in list templates page.

column.name: COLUMN_ID
column.description: ID of the column to be displayed in list workflow page

column.name: PRODUCT_ID
column.description: ID of the product that is using the column

column.name: TABLE_NAME
column.description: Table from which data is to be taken

column.name: COLUMN_NAME
column.description: Column from which data is to be taken

column.name: COLUMN_DISPLAY_NAME
column.description: Value that is displayed in column heading of the table in list workflow page

column.name: COLUMN_WIDTH
column.description: Width of the column

column.name: PRIORITY
column.description: Order in which the column is displayed

column.name: IS_EXT_SOURCE
column.description: If true then the data should be taken from the integrated product. Interface implentation needed for this.

column.name: IS_SORTABLE
column.description: Whether the table data can be sorted based on this column

table.name: ADSIMExcludeObjectList
table.description: List of objects that should be excluded from particular actions

column.name: UNIQUE_ID
column.description: Unique Id

column.name: OBJ_NAME
column.description: Name of the object that will be matched to the input

column.name: OBJ_TYPE
column.description: Type of object. Eg user, computer

table.name: ADSIMCredentials
table.description: For common credentials that are used when no credentials are found in the product

column.name: CRED_ID
column.description: ID of the credential

column.name: CRED_TYPE
column.description: Type: whether linux,switch, etc

column.name: CRED_NAME
column.description: Name for the credential

column.name: USER_NAME
column.description: User name

column.name: PASSWORD
column.description: Password

table.name: ADSIMCredentialDetails
table.description: Additional details needed for credentials like port number etc.

column.name: CRED_ID
column.description: ID from ADSIMCredentials table

column.name: DISPLAY_NAME
column.description: Display name of the additional property

column.name: PARAM_NAME
column.description: TParam name

column.name: PARAM_VALUE
column.description: param value

table.name: ADSIMBlockCategory
table.description: The table that contains the types of the Blocks to be placed in the workflow diagram

column.name: BLOCK_CATEG_ID
column.description: ID of the Block Category.

column.name: BLOCK_CATEG_NAME
column.description: Block grouping names. Like Logic, Active Directory, Notification, etc. Will be displayed when creating or modifying the template.

column.name: PRIORITY
column.description: Order in which the categories are displayed

table.name: ADSIMBlockType
table.description: This table represents the vailable Block's input types. Example: Enable account and Disable account will be of same tyeps. As the inputs are same. But they will have different functionality

column.name: BLOCK_TYPE_ID
column.description: Unique key to identify individual block keys

column.name: BLOCK_TYPE_NAME
column.description: The display name of the block type

table.name: ADSIMBlock
table.description: The table represents the blocks of the workflow chart

column.name: BLOCK_ID
column.description: Unique key for the blocks

column.name: BLOCK_NAME
column.description: Name of the block to be displayed

column.name: PRODUCT_ID
column.description: Product which serves the action. Will be used to fetch product based values. Refer ADSProducts table. 0 means ADS

column.name: BLOCK_TYPE_ID
column.description: Links to the Type of block which will handle the inputs. Points to values in IMBlockType table

column.name: BLOCK_CATEG_ID
column.description: Denotes the category under which this block will be placed

column.name: BLOCK_IMG
column.description: CSS class of the block's image

column.name: BLOCK_HANDLER_CLASS
column.description: The java class that carries out the mentioned operation

column.name: PRIORITY
column.description: Order in which the blocks are displayed

column.name: IS_WINDOWS
column.description: Whether the block is for performing a windows action

column.name: IS_DECISION
column.description: Whether the block is a decision block

table.name: ADSIMBlockTypeInput
table.description: This holds the UI component details for each block type available in the template creation page. When a block is edited, the input details for the popup are taken from here

column.name: BLOCK_TYPE_INPUT_ID
column.description: Unique id for this table

column.name: BLOCK_TYPE_ID
column.description: The data block for which the input is provided

column.name: ATTRIBUTE_NAME
column.description: The input for the block in JSON format

column.name: LABEL
column.description: The input for the block in JSON format

column.name: INPUT_TYPE
column.description: The input for the block in JSON format

column.name: IS_CUSTOM_INPUT
column.description: If custom ember component is used

column.name: DEFAULT_VALUE
column.description: Default value for this input.

column.name: IS_EDITABLE
column.description: Whether the input alone can be editted before execution

column.name: IS_VISIBLE
column.description: Whether the input is visible in the UI, if the input is not visible then generally the value cannot be changed.

column.name: IS_MANDATORY
column.description: Whether the input is mandatory.

column.name: MAX_LENGTH
column.description: Max Length of the input. Applicable only to text, textarea for now.

column.name: MIN_VALUE
column.description: Min length of the integer attribute. Will be used along with validate-number in ads-validation-util

column.name: HELP_TEXT
column.description: Help text for the input if applicable. Null if not required

column.name: PLACE_HOLDER_TEXT
column.description: Placeholder text for the input if applicable. Null if not required. This is only valid for text and textarea inputs

table.name: ADSIMBlockTypeInputMacros
table.description: Macros for inputs in ADSIMBlockTypeInput table. The data shoul be given in the integrating product

column.name: MACRO_ID
column.description: Unique id of the macro

column.name: BLOCK_TYPE_INPUT_ID
column.description: Block type input for which the options are to be used

column.name: LABEL
column.description: Label of the macro

column.name: VALUE
column.description: Value

table.name: ADSIMBlockTypeInputOptions
table.description: Options for inputs in ADSIMBlockTypeInput table

column.name: BLOCK_TYPE_INPUT_OPT_ID
column.description: Unique id for this table

column.name: BLOCK_TYPE_INPUT_ID
column.description: Block type input for which the options are to be used

column.name: LABEL
column.description: Label of the option

column.name: VALUE
column.description: Value

column.name: IS_SELECTED
column.description: Whether the option is selected

column.name: EXT_SOURCE_NAME
column.description: If not null then the data should be taken from the integrated product.

column.name: IS_ALL_OPTIONS
column.description: Whether the default all options are to be set.

table.name: ADSIMBlockInputValidationIds
table.description: Holds all validation IDs that are used for validating block inputs, eg. positive number, email validation, etc. The code for this needs to be added in create-imtemplate.js

column.name: VALIDATION_TYPE_NAME
column.description: Name of the validation

table.name: ADSIMBlockInputVsValidationId
table.description: Mapping between block input and the validation ids

column.name: VALIDATION_ID
column.description: The validation types that need to be performed on the given input. Refer to ADSIMBlockInputValidationIds table for list of all validation IDS, if new ID is to be added then entry must be made in ADSIMBlockInputValidationIds table

column.name: BLOCK_TYPE_INPUT_ID
column.description: Id from ADSIMBlockTypeInput

table.name: ADSIMDataTemplate
table.description: Main table for templates. It contains the overview of the template

column.name: TEMPLATE_ID
column.description: Unique identifier for each template

column.name: TEMPLATE_NAME
column.description: Name of the template

column.name: TEMPLATE_DESCRIPTION
column.description: Can be used to give an overview of the action(s) performed by this template

column.name: CREATED_BY
column.description: User ID of the technician or the user who created this template.

column.name: CREATED_ON
column.description: Creation time of the template

column.name: LAST_MODIFIED
column.description: Date and Time of when the recent modification is performed on the template

column.name: STATUS
column.description: Denotes whether the template is enabled or disabled or hidden, etc.

column.name: IS_DEFAULT
column.description: Whether the template is predefined or created by the user

table.name: ADSIMDataBlock
table.description: This table represents the blocks of a template that has been saved.

column.name: DATA_BLOCK_ID
column.description: Unique key for the template blocks

column.name: TEMPLATE_ID
column.description: The template to which the mentioned block belongs

column.name: DATA_BLOCK_NAME
column.description: Name of the block. Ex: Reset Password, etc.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.description: Description of the Block. Easy for the user to know what they did there.

column.name: BLOCK_ID
column.description: Corresponds to the original ID of the Block

column.name: POS_X
column.description: X co-ordinate of the block

column.name: POS_Y
column.description: Y co-ordinate of the block

table.name: ADSIMDBlockInput
table.description: This holds the UI component details for each block type available in the template creation page. When a block is edited, the input details for the popup are taken from here

column.name: DATA_BLOCK_INP_ID
column.description: Unique id for this table

column.name: BLOCK_TYPE_INPUT_ID
column.description: The entry in ADSIMBlockTypeInput to get label, is editable and validation ids

column.name: DATA_BLOCK_ID
column.description: The data block for which the input is provided

column.name: VALUE
column.description: The input for the block in JSON format. eg. {email:test@test.com,deviceName:comp1}

table.name: ADSIMDataLink
table.description: This column denotes the link between two blocks. Two block may have multiple links based on the condition.

column.name: LINK_ID
column.description: Unique id for this table

column.name: TEMPLATE_ID
column.description: The template to which this link belongs to

column.name: SRC_BLOCK_ID
column.description: Originating or source block of the link

column.name: CONDITION
column.description: Condition for executing this link. If this is not specified, then the link will be executed for any result from the source or originating block

column.name: DEST_BLOCK_ID
column.description: The block that will be executed if this link is entered

table.name: ADSIMTemplateAudit
table.description: This template shows the changes made to the template by an user since it is created.

column.name: TEMPLATE_AUDIT_ID
column.description: Unique ID for each change (creation or modification) on the template.

column.name: TEMPLATE_ID
column.description: Id of the template that is created or modified.

column.name: MODIFIED_BY
column.description: User ID of the technician who modified this template.

column.name: MODIFIED_TIME
column.description: The time at which the modification was done

column.name: CHANGE_TYPE
column.description: Type of change performed on the template. Like Creation, Modification and Deletion

table.name: ADSIMExecution
table.description: This table contains the initiated incident execution data. This will contain only the overall information. Detailed actions performed for each blocks will be present in ADSIMExecutionAudit table.

column.name: EXECUTION_ID
column.description: Unique ID representing each individual incident template executions

column.name: TEMPLATE_ID
column.description: The template ID of the execution. As we dont allow to modify a template after the execution starts, if need to get what was the template data for this execution, refer ADSIMTemplateAudit table

column.name: INPUT_NAME
column.description: The action in the integrated product that causes the template execution. This is used while viewing the WF logs.

column.name: MODIFIED_TIME
column.description: The time at which this row was added or last modified whichever is latest

column.name: STATUS
column.description: Shows the execution status of the full process.

column.name: STATUS_MSG
column.description: Shows the execution status of the full process in plain understandable text.

table.name: ADSIMExecutionAudit
table.description: This table contains the detailed input and exact result of all the blocks that are completely executed or being executed. This table will not have an entry of a block unless it is executed.

column.name: AUDIT_ID
column.description: Unique id for Each Audit execution block for any template being executed.

column.name: EXECUTION_ID
column.description: Points to the template's current execution id.

column.name: BLOCK_NAME
column.description: Points to the current template's block which status is represented in this record.

column.name: MODIFIED_TIME
column.description: The time at which this row was added or last modified whichever is latest

column.name: STATUS
column.description: Status of the block in this record.

column.name: STATUS_MSG
column.description: Shows the execution status of the current block in this row in plain understandable text.
